description: Turn your phone or tablet into a Tour Guide for Maui. Commentary plays AUTOMATICALLY as you drive. GyPSy Guide is the most comprehensive and entertaining way to explore by driving all around Maui. You can read about what other visitors think of GyPSy Guide Maui commentary on Trip Advisor. This tour has 470+ commentary points and is the full guide to the entire island! ** Once downloaded, this tour REQUIRES NO DATA to operate and activate, so you won’t incur roaming or data charges. Just download the app on Wi-Fi from your network at home or use the free Wi-Fi at the airport, your hotel or any other location. This is the perfect and most comprehensive guide for anyone planning to explore all over the island. This tour has commentary everywhere you will venture including the entire Road to Hana tour and the tour to the summit of Haleakala. In addition, there is commentary connecting the airport and central Maui to all resort areas in and around Ka'anapali and Lahaina and Kihei and Wailea. The commentary routes continue all the way around west Maui past Kapalua, Honolua and Kahakuloa on the rugged windward side of the island and down to the wide sandy beaches of Makena. Since 2009, GyPSy Guide has been the most highly rated and award winning GPS Tour on Maui. Now as an app, you can you can travel independently, but still enjoy a guided tour experience, right from your own phone or tablet. You won’t miss a thing and you won’t waste your time when GyPSy is your tour guide. The screen map will display your position and upcoming audio points. You can also preview the tour before you arrive, or re-live your vacation after you return home. This app is not just a directory. It provides a guided tour experience. You will feel like a local expert is showing you the best of everything as you drive. There is no need to read a guidebook as you drive, or to remember where to press play and stop on a CD. GyPSy knows where you are and plays automatically.
release_text: Bug fixed for end of audio cut off issues New improved map and tour route display Updated for new GyPSy Guide destinations

description: This app saves you time! Busy? Ahead of time, use it to add your name to the list at your local Great Clips salon. How does it save you time? When you’re on the list, chances are you’ll be next as soon as you arrive. How does it work? It’s easy – just open the app and the salons nearest your current location will appear. Touch the salon that has the estimated wait time that fits you best, then tell us your name, number and how many are in your group. Then, head right over to your Great Clips salon to receive the quality haircut or service you want. Download this app and you’ve made getting a great haircut even easier. *For safety and privacy reasons we do not publish stylist schedules through the App. The estimated wait time when you check in is based on the next available stylist. You can request a stylist upon arrival at the salon but, if you do so, your wait may be longer. Next time, save time! The Great Clips application was designed and developed by Innovative Computer Software and utilizes ICS Net Check In™.

description: A complete SSHd, SFTP, SCP and Telnet server! From now on you can run a complete SSH daemon (server) with support for multiple users, public key authentication, and you can even set a directory per user for SFTP and SCP. NO ROOT is required, but if you do have a rooted device you can run SSH as super user if you want. The shell will only work on ARM devices, however, the SFTP and SCP servers will work on all devices. Note 1. To run on ports below 1024 search for Android app Port Forwarder Ultimate. Note 2. If you find a bug or have a problem please contact us by email since we cannot help you if you post it in the reviews. And we haven’t mentioned all yet; you can even set a dynamic DNS updater! So you can always access your device from everywhere, even if the IP changed! It also has extensive logging functionality, and you can even set the app to email you the log automatically! Features summary: - SSH has support for SFTP and SCP - For SSH, SFTP and SCP multiple users can be set with each their own root directory, password, public key (RSA or DSA), allow X11 or agent forwarding, allow inbound/outbound connections, optional write permission and optional force stay in root directory - For Telnet you can add multiple users and run Telnet through SSL/TLS with your own certificate or our certificate - Set your own shell start command and arguments (advanced) - Start/Stop a server automatically when connected/disconnected from a specified WIFI network, or on boot - Verbose log (filter, email, etc) - Optionally only allow specified IP addresses to access - Add a Dynamic DNS Updater using the local or public IP of your device - The servers can be accessed from the web (for example through your 3G connection) if supported by your mobile network All features: - Add multiple SSH (SSHd, SSH daemon) or Telnet servers - For every SSH Server you can set name, port, multiple users, only access from certain IP addresses, vibrate on a new connection, enable logging, only log errors, start the server when connected to a specific WIFI network and disconnect when the WIFI network is lost, start on boot, max auth attempts, authorization timeout, idle timeout, max concurrent sessions (per user) - For every user set the username, password, public key, X11 / agent forwarding, inbound / outbound connections, document root, force stay in document root, allow write access - For every Telnet server you can set multiple users or even enable SSL/TLS with your own certificate or our certificate - Add multiple dynamic DNS updaters (set a custom URL, or choose from ChangeIP, DNSdynamic, DNSexit, DNSMadeEasy, DNS-O-Matic, DNSPark, DtDNS, DynDNS, easyDNS, eNom, HE.net, Joker, Namecheap, No-IP, ZoneEdit) - For every dynamic DNS updater set the name, timeout (in minutes), hostname, username, password and whether to update with the local or public IP address, start the Dynamic DNS Updater when connected to a specific WIFI network, update on connectivity change, start on boot - On the settings page of the app you can set the maximum log items to keep, whether to keep a WIFI lock (prevent WIFI from disconnecting automatically), keep the device alive, keep the device alive full (keep the screen on, battery intensive), set to start the app on boot - You can search/filter the log, or set it to be automatically sent when the log limit is reached For questions, comments or feature requests just contact us! Visit us on: http://www.icecoldapps.com/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceColdApps Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IceColdApps
release_text: - for users added public key authentication (RSA or DSA/DSS) - for users allow agent/X11 forwarding or inbound/outbound connections - set timeouts for idle andauthorization and/or set max authorization attempts and max concurrent sessions per user - and we fixed some bugs

description: Poland GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. Essentially complete articles with multiple hotel and restaurant listings are suggested for Warsaw, Kraków, Łódź, Wrocław and other travel destinations. • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. Poland travel guide contains around 220 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 440 well­ chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. With MAPS.ME you will always have maps of any countries in your pocket. We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Up to traveling to Italy, Russia, Turkey, Switzerland, Japan, Hawaii or other parts of the world? Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google+: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels!

description: ★仲間をピンボールのように弾きながらモンスターを倒そう! ▼ゲーム紹介 あなたはこれから4人の仲間を率いて魔王を倒す冒険に出ます。 敵に突撃しながらモンスターを倒し、世界に平和を取り戻そう! ▼遊び方は簡単! 仲間を引っ張って離すと、ピンボールのように飛んでいきます。 敵モンスターにぶつかってダメージを与えよう。 さらに、仲間にぶつけると特殊攻撃を繰り出すぞ! ▼モンスターがいるダンジョンを進め! モンスターがいるダンジョンは全部で45ステージ。 敵によって弱点があるから戦略を練って攻撃だ! ▼パワーアップアイテムもあるぞ! 戦いに勝利するとお金がもらえるぞ。 勝ち取ったお金でアイテムをGETすれば戦いが有利になるぞ! 簡単操作で誰にでも遊べて、暇つぶしや友達との話題づくりに最適です。 全ステージのコンプリートを目指して頑張ってください（＾ω＾） ★ The Defeat monsters while playing as a fellow pinball! ▼ Games Info You will appear in the adventure to defeat the devil led his companion of four now. To defeat the monster while assault the enemy, and bring back peace to the world! ▼ How to Play It's easy! When you release it by pulling the fellow, we will fly like pinball. Have some damage to hit the enemy monsters. In addition, paying out a special attack if it strikes a friend! ▼ To complete the dungeon there are monsters! Dungeon there are monster stage 45 in total. It's attacks strategizing because there is a weak point by the enemy! ▼ There is also a power-up item! Get money if you win the battle. The fight will be advantageous if the GET items with the money you have won! The play anyone by simple operation, making it ideal for buzz with friends and pass the time. Please do your best with the aim of complete of all the stages (^ ω ^)

It is a place where everyone will find something interesting and exciting. With the application you can Classmates: - Keep in touch with friends and family - Free calls to friends - Upload and edit photos - Download and watch the most interesting and popular videos - Listen to your favorite music and learn about the musical preferences of their friends - To give emotions to friends and family with the help of a variety of gifts - Be aware of all the news of their groups and to take part in the discussion ... And still keep track of holidays, playing games, evaluate photos, notes and comments threads to receive awards and much more!

description: Love Free Font Theme for Samsung Galaxy FlipFont® and GO Launcher EX 10-Font free Love FFT Font Pack is designed to be compatible with Samsung Galaxy & Monotype Imaging Inc.'s FlipFont® program and will install new free fonts on your galaxy phone that are compatible with the FlipFont® program on your phone. The FFT Font Pack is also designed to support GO Launcher EX and will allow the user to import the included fonts into the Go Launcher Application. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with GO Launcher EX or Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont® trademark and technology. This App works with the Samsung Galaxy FlipFont® program and/or GO Launcher EX. You can use the FlipFont® program on your galaxy phone to change the user interface font on your phone to one of these 10 free Love FFT fonts. You can use the GO Launcher EX program to import these 10 free Love FFT fonts for use in the launcher's theme. This font pack includes 10 free fonts designed for FlipFont® free. This font pack is one of the only apps designed for Samsung Galaxy FlipFont that provides working fonts for samsung galaxy 4, samsung galaxy 3, and samsung galaxy note 3 phone. This font pack should work on all Galaxy brand phones (except for the Nexus). To use this font pack, verify that your phone can change it's font in the "Display" -> "Screen Display" section of "Settings"... or you have a rooted phone. This plug-in should work on any phone that allows for custom fonts and has FlipFont® or can be used with GO Launcher EX. This android application is not affiliated with GO Launcher EX, FlipFont®, or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.

description: Словарь World of Warcraft терминов. Все непонятные слова, выражения собраны в данной программе. Она подойдет как новичку, так и бывалому игроку в WoW. Доступен поиск по всей базе, навигация жестами и добавление своих терминов. Присылайте новые термины и попадайте в рейтинговую таблицу внутри приложения. ** Также доступна на Windows Phone Store. Dictionary of World of Warcraft terms. All unintelligible words, expressions collected in this program. It is suitable for both novice and seasoned player in WoW. You can search the entire database, navigation gestures and adding its terms. Post new terms and fall into the rating table within the application. ** Also available in the Windows Phone Store.

description: A detective mystery from Delight Games, the makers of Wizard's Choice and Zombie High! Download it while it's FREE. Your name is Jack Jericho. You’re a detective. But you don’t investigate cheating wives or crooked business partners. You investigate things that go bump in the night. When a beautiful blonde strolls into your office and says someone's trying to kill her, you smell danger. Too bad you need the money. Psycho killers, the mob, and even black magic. Can you solve this mystery and live to collect your fee? Detective's Choice is an RPG text-based adventure that will engross you in a story line while allowing you to make the decisions that will determine your fate. Story written by William Miller. *** Features *** - Super simple to learn with one thumb/finger touch control - Life, Rage, Cool, and Money are tracked - Score and rank at the end. - Accessible to blind users

description: Little time killer ;) Simple but addictive game where your goal is to jump over moving box. Challenge yourself - how long you can survive? Collect power-ups. Try double/triple jump and jump higher to stay longer in the game. Make your jump! Game rules: You control moving circle(red dot), when you press jump - dot jumps up, avoid contact with moving box by jumping over it. The more score you get, smarter box became and it will try to catch you in different way:) Enjoy! Have Fun!

description: == Experience the fun of Circus & Clown! == Extremely fun physics game! Simply aim and launch your clown in the air and have him pass thru various hoops. Sounds easy right? Well requires a lot of skills to avoid the different obstacles that might get in the way. You have to aim and launch him at the perfect angle to get it right. The objective of the game is to drag, hold and set the angle as well as power to release the clown. Collect as many coins as you can and upgrade your powers for added help. 2 Types of Hoops: - Burning Hoops - Electric Hoops The hoops within the game are designed in different shapes and are placed in challenging locations. The game play is extremely easy and fun to play. So see if you have the skills to help him jump thru all the hoops. Tip: You can pass thru the hoop from top or bottom. Enjoy the best circus-style strategy physics game on all your Android devices today! ====================================== BULLET POINTS ====================================== Beautiful Graphics Superb & Fun Sound Effects 50 Challenging Levels Share On Facebook

description: My Local Places, Around Me is a Simple Fun App that helps you find a local place near by your current location. eg. local parks, restaurants, cafes, pubs and many more! * Perform Searches around me to find a fun new Place * Uses your current GPS/Network Location (Highly Optimized) * Provides the Shortest route to a Place * Clear Place listings around me * Simple and Easy to use * Fully Integrated with Google Maps and Phone Dialling A Major update has just taken place! If your saying to yourself, i need to find some fun places around me, then you have come to the right place. We have every place type you can think of, including: parks, restaurants, cafes, pubs, night clubs, movie theaters, ATMs, taxis, gyms and many more. You can now save your favourite place types to make it much easier to browse the app. You can still search for your favourite place types, but now with a more powerful and accurate search feature. Find out your current address address by simply pressing on the GPS button in the menu bar, this is really helpful when your on the phone and your trying to tell someone exactly where you are. Sort your place results by rating, relevance, distance or name. Find your places on an easy to use map which now provides multiple routes to each location - just simply touch any place marker and change a route by swiping at the bottom of the map. The places screen now has a list view and map view - so you can view all your local places around me on a highly advanced map. See photos, reviews, ratings and other detailed information about a place before spending your time travelling there. You can also easily view the place's website or call them up straight from the app! Customise the app to suite you by heading over to the settings screen, you can change the metrics to km or miles, change your searching distance, sort your search results, avoid certain types of travel types (tolls, ferries, highways) and specify how you want to get to your location (by car, foot, bike or transit). We hope you like the update - expect many more features in the near future. KW: my local, around me, places near me, places, place nearby, local, place, near me, near by
release_text: My Local Places, Around Me helps you find a local place near by your current location. Major changes include: - A new easy to use Map View to help you get to your place quicker - More details about each place, such as reviews, photos, ratings, distances and much more. - All possible Routes to your location on the map. - Change your metrics (KM or Miles) - Avoid highways, tolls or certain travel types (ie. walking, driving, cycling or transit) - Save your Favourite Place Types. *And much more*

description: You're taking Finite Mathematics, and you don't have this app? Give yourself an edge! "Finite Math Pro" contains a rich collection of tutorials, examples, and solvers for the following topics: Points and Lines: - Solvers and tutorials to find slopes, intercepts, equations of lines, and graphs of lines - System solver for 2 variables and 2 equations - Tutorials for solving systems by graphing, substitution, and linear combinations Linear Regression: - Solver to find the best fit line and correlation coefficient for up to 30 points - Linear regression tutorial and example Matrices: - Adding, subtracting, and multiplying matrices - Identity matrices - Solvers and tutorials to find determinants/inverses of 2 x 2 and 3 x 3 matrices Linear Programming (graphical method): - Tutorial - Example with step-by-step solution Probability: - Formulas - Survey Results - Venn Diagrams - Bayes' Theorem - Permutations - Combinations - Balls in Urns - Independent Events - Poker, Roulette, Dice, Lottery, General Card Problems Normal Distributions: - Solve for area under a bell curve without using Z-score tables - Solve for value on bell curve given area without using Z-score tables - Examples and tutorials Compound Interest: - Solve for amount, principle, time or rate - Examples and tutorials If you like my app, please leave a review! If you don't like my app, please email me with your constructive feedback! I welcome all comments, questions, and suggestions: lfeldman65@gmail.com I will answer your math questions for free on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lfeldmantutoring Please check out my other Android apps: Algebra Pro ACT Math Prep Calculus Pro Geometry Pro Math Pro (6 math apps for $1.99!) PreCalculus Pro Probability Pro SAT Math Prep Statistics Pro

description: 2 GAMES IN ONE: DEFENSE & RUNNER Crazy Mob AN UNUSUAL DEFENSE GAME Aren't you tired of tower construction as in usual Tower Defense? Do you need something new? Crazy Mob will bring you NEW EXPERIENCE. It's the most amazing and crazy defense & runner game you ever played. Mob of funny monsters try to reach your camp. Use your extraordinary arsenal wisely to stop them. Finally, A NEW APPROACH TO DEFENSE GAME. ★★★★★ Can You Defeat Lots Of Hilarious Monsters?★★★★★ IT WILL GET YOU IN THE MOOD Fire watermelons and anvils, blow bubbles, explode snowmen and gift boxes. Crazy Mob uses REAL PHYSICS so the monsters are lifelike: they ran, they jump, they bounce and shoot upwards... The amazing gameplay, beautiful music, excellent graphics and animation will get you in the mood. ★★★★★ It's More Than Just Another Defense Game★★★★★ THE GAME IS CATCHY ♥ Two game modes (Defense & Runner). Defend yourself from the monsters or play for one of them. ♥ 4 game-worlds (Forest, desert, rocks and volcanoes) ♥ 18 unique funny monster (mushroom, turtle, hedgehog, yeti, mummy, cactus, zebra, Anubis, skeleton, zombie, Jack, knight, coal, dragon, golem, demon, pumpkin) with different powers (regeneration, immunity from the weapon, Calls up the monsters, resurrects from the tomb... ) ♥ Day and night missions ♥ Incredible weapon: watermelons, bubbles, gift boxes, snowmen, anvils ♥ Change the gravity, direction, construction and destruction of bridges... ♥ No in-app purchasing ★★★★★ This Game Is Really Crazy★★★★★ ★★★★★ Enjoy Exciting And Fun Gaming For Hours★★★★★ ♥AppEggs - "Crazy Mob Lite is really a good and crazy defense game. You will like it when you see it." ♥XDA-developers - "...if you’re looking to escape from, let’s say, a crazy mob of critters, you’d best be served by practicing with Crazy Mob...Crazy Mob is unlike most other defense games..." P.S. The crazy monsters are coming for you. Do you want to defeat them? Please, leave your review for the game to improve.

description: The new update is here! Collect stars to unlock new dogs, tracks and extra features. Use a teleport when falling into a pit and save your dog! Game Over? Never! Resurrect your dog to play more! facebook.com/AgilityCity DOGS: * Jack Russell terrier * Welsh Corgi * Border Collie * Boxer TRACKS: * Shanghai League * Medieval Challenge * Alpine Adventure * Night Fishing * Space Race * Pacific Express Beat your friends at OpenFeint with 3 lives and a possibility of resurrection! Have you ever wondered what it feels like to be an agility dog? Now you have the unique opportunity to find out. The agility course that you will take is challenging, as the difficulty gradually increases. Jump over, crawl under and avoid any obstacles while you run faster and faster. Although the course never ends there are many achievements you can attain and publish, along with your score, on Facebook. FEATURES: * Collect starts to unlock new dogs and tracks * Use a teleport to avoid pitfalls * Resurrect your dog on Game Over * Optimized for all Android phones and tablets * Addictive gameplay * Hi-res loveable graphics (all resolutions are supported) * Great music * Multiple achievements to unlock * Increasing difficulty * Share your score with friends on Facebook * Your score and achievements are displayed at OpenFeint
release_text: Collect stars to unlock new dogs, tracks and extra features. Use a teleport when falling into a pit and save your dog! Game Over? Never! Resurrect your dog to play more!

description: "TVBS首部原創概念劇《飛越龍門客棧》APP上線！ 一樁驚動全國的爆炸案，牽扯出20年前的風風雨雨 一座臥虎藏龍的暗黑之城，交錯著四名男女的愛恨情慾 誰，能全身而退？ 《飛越龍門客棧》APP將帶領你走入最神秘的龍門境地，一窺城寨的愛恨情仇，與演員即時互動，掌握第一線的龍門秘辛！ 創造能見度高、差異化的突破。 本劇的題材來自於華人世界中赫赫有名、令人難以忘懷的徐克武俠電影《新龍門客棧》，將這個經典的故事框架移到現代的時空，但保留了每個經典人物的性格，與他們之間因為性格廻異而產生的互動及火花。 故事從一場爆炸案開始 國家慶典前一天，首相突然失蹤了，與他最後接觸的安全局長邱啟賢於是成了嫌疑犯。邱啟賢的女兒、同樣為安全局一員的邱默語為了替父親洗刷冤屈，帶著首相女兒艾心至「龍門城寨」，希望能找到證據替證明父親清白。 邱默語的青梅竹馬周懷安原在國外受訓，為此趕回國同樣到了「龍門城寨」。城寨的主人金湘玉，一個風騷多情身上充滿秘密的女人，加上西區警探小刀，這四人聚首於「龍門城寨」，將發展出一段愛恨情仇。 究竟誰才是綁架首相的兇手？四人感情如何糾葛？ 《飛越龍門客棧》─TVBS即將為您呈現……" *「目前本APP尚未支援平板」
release_text: 1. 修正Android系統部分機型使用「龍門諜影」功能時，鏡頭翻轉會導致APP終止之錯誤。 2. 推播功能更新。

description: +++ Now with free Offline Maps, Tour Tickets and even better value Premium Upgrades! +++ With TOURIAS Travel Guides you always have all the important information to hand when travelling. And all this in over 120 travel destinations. Whether you’re at home on the couch, out and about at your holiday destination or even after the trip, the TOURIAS Travel Guide gives you useful tips for your holiday or your business trip. It makes no difference if you’re visiting the sights, discovering great restaurants or going out to the trendiest clubs. And the TOURIAS Travel Guides also offer a lot more: • Complimentary offline maps and complete offline use without expensive roaming fees • MyGuide: take photos, write text and save it all. Of course, you can also share your personal experiences on Facebook • Tour Tickets: you can book alternative tours from locals directly and in doing so, explore your travel destination in a truly special way • Augmented Reality: discover the hotspots of your holiday destination via the camera on your Smartphone/Tablet • GPS use – where am I? • “Nearby” Function – where’s the next restaurant? • Upgrade: the optional upgrade allows the guide to be completely free of advertising Further TOURIAS Travel Guides for lots of interesting travel destinations can be also be found easily via this app. Simply select the desired destination under “Further Destinations” and you will be linked automatically to the app store. We hope you enjoy using this free travel guide. We very happy to receive your feedback, information about the travel destination, your wishes and suggestions at info@tourias-mobile.com . Discover sights like Rijksmuseum, Anne Frank House, Westerkerk, Van Gogh Museum, Dam, Nieuwe Kerk, Nieuwmarkt, Scheepvaartmuseum, Nemo Science Museum, Jordaan, Koninklijk Paleis op de Dam, Artis, Amsterdam Diamond Group, Madame Tussauds Amsterdam, Amsterdam Historical Museum, Roemer Visscherstraat, Rembrandthuis, Heineken Brewery, Begijnhof, Tropenmuseum

description: The Star Trek Clock Widget is a digital clock displaying the current time. See http://www.cmwmobile.com for the explanation of all LCARS audio effects. The following languages are available: ---------------------------------------------- - Ba'ku - Borg - Fabrini - Federation Classic - Gallaudet - Gornathon - Klingon - Klinzhai - Klinzhai Hollow - Malcorian - Medusan - Preservers - Romulan - Son'a - Starfleet - Star Trek Binar - Star Trek Next Generation - Swiss 911 (LCARS) - Tholian - Tkon There are six different widget sizes available: -------------------------------------------------------- Star Trek Clock Widget Large: 3x2 widget displaying both the time and stardate. If there are any issues or wishes please send an email to cmwmobile.com@gmail.com or visit http://www.cmwmobile.com .

description: Bubble level also known as spirit level is a free, handy, accurate, simple to use and incredibly useful tool for your Android device. A spirit level or bubble level is an instrument designed to indicate whether a surface is horizontal (level) or vertical (plumb). Vials on modern level meter have a slightly curved glass tube which is incompletely filled with a liquid, usually a colored spirit or alcohol, leaving a bubble in the tube. At slight inclinations the bubble travels away from the center position, which is usually marked. Bubble Level app tries to mimic the real level meter and displays the data as real level meter would. An extension of the spirit level is the bull's eye level: a circular, flat-bottomed device with the liquid under a slightly convex glass face with a circle at the center. It serves to level a surface across a plane, while the tubular level only does so in the direction of the tube. Bubble Level app tries to mimic the real bull's eye level and displays the data as real bull's eye level would. Where any why use Bubble Level? A bubble level is a device used in construction, carpentry and photography that determines if objects on which you're working are level. Used properly, a bubble level can help you create flawlessly level pieces of furniture, staircases and homes. A bubble level is also helpful when setting up a tripod for photographs or when hanging paintings or other items on the wall.

description: DMD Clone is a fully automated cloning camera app. No need for manual adjustments, no preset frames, just shoot, shoot, shoot, done! Share the result on Instagram using #dmdclone and see what other people are creating. Features: - up to 7 pictures (manual/timer - rear/front camera - flash/torch) - new in 1.1: "whistle mode" to remotely activate the camera (by whistling, the reason why we ask the authorization to access the microphone) - unlimited number of moving elements - no need to use a mask, the moving element can be anywhere - instantaneous result (you get the result while shooting) - built-in image stabilization, no need to be perfectly still - when you finish, remove useless moving elements by just tapping on them - share on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter or open with your favorite app to re-edit Instructions: - take a minimum of 3 pictures (up to 7) - shoot a moving element over a fixed background (white walls are not your best friends) - hold the camera still, don't follow the moving element (but you can breathe) - if you only need to make a "twin", shoot the background first - avoid too much overlap between 2 consecutive positions (but if you shoot more than 4 images, the algorithm will handle it) - tap on finish when done - tap on any moving element to remove, tap again to bring it back - double-tap on the background to remove all the moving elements, double-tap again to bring them back Permissions explanation: RECORD_AUDIO : for detecting whistles CAMERA : for taking pictures ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE + INTERNET : for showing online gallery WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : for saving results For any comment, please contact us because we cannot reply to the reviews. We promise to give you a prompt and helpful answer: help@DMDClone.com

description: Vous avez envie de bouger sur Bordeaux ? Vous cherchez une activité intéressante sur votre région Bordelaise ? L'application Sortir sur Bordeaux regroupe les événements de votre région : concerts, conférence, danse,... De nombreux événements sont regroupés dans différentes catégories pour vous aider à trouver une activité intéressante suivant votre envie. L'application calcule automatiquement la distance entre vous et chaque événement ainsi vous pouvez voir quels événements sont les plus proches de vous. ################################# Cette première version est susceptible de posséder quelques bugs, si vous en rencontrez un, n'hésitez pas à me contacter. Je ferais de mon mieux pour le résoudre. N'hésitez pas à noter l'application, cela ne vous prend que 10 secondes, et ça peut nous aider à l'améliorer. You want to move to Bordeaux? Looking for an interesting activity on your Bordeaux region? The application of Bordeaux brings out the events in your area including concerts, conferences, dance, ... Many events are grouped into different categories to help you find an interesting activity according to your desire. The application automatically calculates the distance between you and each event so you can see what events are closest to you. # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # This first version is likely to have some bugs, if you find one, do not hesitate to contact me. I do my best to solve it. Please note the application, it only takes 10 seconds, and it can help us improve.

app_name: Yahoo!ファイルマネージャー：無料でファイル整理
description: Android 5.0 以上の端末でのmicroSDカードに書き込み方法について Android 5.0 以上の端末でmicroSDカードに書き込みを可能にするには、本アプリに対して書き込み権限を設定する必要があります。 以下の手順で設定を行ってください。 1.アプリ内の設定から「SDカード書き込み権限」を選択(Android 5.0以上でもSDカードスロットがない、もしくはSDカードが挿入されていない場合は設定項目はありません。) 2.権限設定方法の説明ダイアログが表示されます。 3.「権限を設定する」を選択。 4.Android標準のドキュメントアプリが開きます。 5.ここで書き込みを行いたいmicroSDカードの一番上の階層を表示させます。 6.画面下部にある「SDカードを選択」を選択。 7.「Yahoo!ファイルマネージャー」アプリに戻り、「SDカードへのアクセスが許可されました」と表示されればSDカードへの書き込みが可能となります。 ※SDカードの一番上の階層以外を選択するとうまく書き込みができませんので必ず一番上の階層を選択してください。 設定方法については「2.権限設定方法の説明ダイアログ」も併せてご覧ください。 Android 4.4 のmicroSDカードスロット付き端末をお使いの方へのお知らせ Android 4.4 の端末では、SDカードへの書き込みが制限される仕様となってしまいました。 これは、Googleの提供する基本ソフトにおける仕様変更のため、アプリ側で対応することができません。 そのため、該当する端末では、SDカードに関わる一部の機能をお使いいただけません。 ■ご利用いただけない機能 ・SDカードにあるファイルの削除、名前変更、圧縮、解凍 ・SDカードでのフォルダー作成 ・SDカードへのファイルのコピー、移動 ■ご利用いただける機能 ・SDカードに関係のないすべての機能 ・SDカードにあるファイルの参照（閲覧） ・SDカードから本体へのファイルのコピー ご不便をお掛けする形になり申し訳ありませんが、何卒ご理解いただけますようお願いいたします。 本体（内部ストレージ）のファイル操作は問題なくご利用いただけますので、本体に保存されたファイルの管理にお使いいただけますと幸いです。 ★☆祝☆★おかげさまで100万ダウンロード突破しました！ 高評価をいただきありがとうございます。 Yahoo!ファイルマネージャーは端末内のファイルをドラッグ＆ドロップで簡単に操作・整理できる新感覚のファイラー（ファイル管理、ファイルエクスプローラー）アプリです。 カメラで撮影した写真をすぐに見たり、共有したり。 SDカードの容量がいっぱいになったら、いらないファイルを見つけて簡単に削除。 削除するのはちょっと…という時はまとめてzipファイルに圧縮して、かしこく容量節約♪ アーカイブビューアー機能でzipファイルを解凍せずに閲覧も可能！ さまざまなファイル操作をもっと便利に。 「Yahoo!ファイルマネージャー」で新しいスマホのファイル管理を始めましょう。 「Yahoo!ファイルマネージャー」はYahoo! JAPANが提供する公式アプリです（日本語対応）。 もちろん無料アプリです。 ＜主な機能＞ ■ファイル操作 　ファイルを長押ししてドラッグ＆ドロップすることで、さまざまなファイル操作を行えます。 　・コピー 　・移動 　・削除 　・名前変更 　・共有 　・zip圧縮 　・zip解凍 　・詳細情報の表示 　　フォルダーの詳細情報ではサイズ順にフォルダー内のファイルが表示されます。 　　画像、動画、音楽、アプリはさらに詳細な情報を確認できます。 　　　画像…Exif情報（幅、高さ、撮影日時、メーカー、機種、焦点距離、フラッシュ、ホワイトバランス、位置情報） 　　　動画…動画情報（再生時間、解像度、位置情報） 　　　音楽…音楽情報（再生時間、タイトル、アーティスト、アルバム） 　　　アプリ…アプリ情報（アプリ名、パッケージ、バージョン、インストール日時、アップデート日時） ■2画面表示 　・エクスプローラー 　　2つの画面を別々に自由に操作できるので、ファイルやフォルダーのコピー・移動が直感的に行えます。 　　本体領域とSDカードのように別々のストレージ領域を表示すればSDカードへデータのバックアップが簡単に行えます。 ■かんたんホーム 　ファイル管理アプリを使い慣れていない方でも「かんたんホーム」で目的のファイルがすぐに見つかります。 　・ストレージ使用状況 　　本体、SDカードのデータ容量や、種類（アプリ、画像、動画、音楽、その他、空き）が確認できます。 　・ファイル検索 　　端末内にあるファイルを、ファイル名で検索できます。 　・新着 　　新しく端末内に入ったファイルを日付順に確認できます。 　・お気に入り 　　好きなファイル・フォルダーをお気に入りに登録できます。 　・ダウンロード 　　ダウンロードフォルダーへのショートカットです。 　・画像、動画、音楽 　　端末内のすべての画像、動画、音楽ファイルを確認できます。 　・本体、SDカード 　　端末内をエクスプローラー画面で表示します。 ■画像ビューアー（ギャラリー） 　ヘッダー部分に表示 　・フォルダー名…表示しているファイルが存在するフォルダー名を表します。 　・撮影日時…Exif情報に格納されている「撮影日時」を表示します。ファイルの更新日時ではありません。 　・枚数…フォルダーに存在する画像ファイルの枚数と、現在の位置を表示します。 　フッター部分に表示 　・削除…ファイルを削除します。 　・編集…画像を編集できるアプリを起動します。（画像編集アプリがインストールされていない場合は何も起動しません。） 　・共有…別のアプリを起動します。（共有先のアプリがインストールされていない場合は何も起動しません。） 　・詳細…画像の詳細情報（Exif情報など）を表示します。 　・メニュー 　　・名前変更…ファイルの名前を変更します。 　　・壁紙登録…壁紙に登録するアプリを起動します。（インストールされていない場合は何も起動しません。） 　　・ショートカットを作成…端末のホーム画面に画像のショートカットを作成します。 　便利な機能 　・画像表示画面でダブルタップすると画像の拡大・縮小ができます。 　・かんたんホーム＞画像＞表示切替　で端末の中のすべての画像が表示されます。 　　※同じフィルダーにある画像をビューアーで閲覧したい場合は、Yahoo!ファイルマネージャーの「ギャラリー」を使用してください。 ■アーカイブビューアー 　zip形式の圧縮ファイルの階層を解凍せずにエクスプローラー形式で閲覧できます。 　便利な機能 　・選択したファイルのみを解凍できます アストロファイルマネージャー、ESファイルエクスプローラーをお使いの方も、ぜひ一度Yahoo!ファイルマネージャーお試しください！ ※バージョン1.0.5以下をお使いのお客様へ バージョン1.0.5以下のアプリには不具合がございます。アプリのアップデートをお願いいたします。 ※スマートフォンのホーム画面では「Y!ファイルマネージャー」と表示されます。 ＜よくあるご質問＞ ■「本体」が表示されない かんたんホームに「本体」が表示されない端末がございます。（主にAndroid OS 2.3系端末） お使いの端末のストレージは下記の手順で確認できます。 ・Android端末の設定から「ストレージ」または「microSDと端末容量」を選択 　・Yahoo!ファイルマネージャーで「本体」表示される端末： 　　内部メモリ、ユーザーメモリ（本体）、USBストレージ　などが存在（内蔵SDカード） 　・Yahoo!ファイルマネージャーで「SDカード」が表示される端末： 　　SDカード、microSD　などが存在（外部SDカード） 　※端末により表示される文言が異なる場合があります。 ＜推奨環境＞ Android OS 2.3.3以上のスマートフォン、タブレットで利用できます。 ただし、Android OS 3.xはサポート対象外です。ご了承ください。 また、Android OS 4.4 以上では一部機能がお使いいただけません。 詳しくは、上段の「Android 4.4 以上の端末をお使いの方へのお知らせ」をご覧ください。 ＜利用規約＞ 本アプリケーションは、Yahoo! JAPAN利用規約（プライバシーポリシー,ソフトウエアガイドラインを含みます）ご確認のうえ、ご利用ください。 ■Yahoo! JAPAN利用規約 http://docs.yahoo.co.jp/docs/info/terms/ ■プライバシーポリシー http://docs.yahoo.co.jp/docs/info/terms/chapter1.html#cf2nd ■ソフトウエアガイドライン http://docs.yahoo.co.jp/docs/info/terms/chapter1.html#cf5th

description: Nemo is designed to start you speaking the most useful words in Czech immediately and confidently. With millions of downloads from around the world, Nemo is now available for Android phones and tablets. ✓ Every Czech word is pronounced clearly in high quality audio from a native speaker. ✓ All audio is downloaded to your device, and is available offline or in airplane mode. ✓ Master your accent with the Speech Studio. Simply record yourself saying a phrase and then hear your voice next to the teacher’s. Then try again. You’ll be AMAZED how quickly your foreign accent melts away. ✓ Nemo is not built around lessons at all. It is meant to be picked up throughout the day, whenever you have a few minutes to spare. ✓ NO PRIOR KNOWLEDGE of Czech is required. Nemo targets the words and phrases most often used in conversation. For beginners, we’ve prepared “If You Only Learn 10 Things”, “If You Only Learn 50 Things”, and “If You Only Learn 100 Things” lists for a fast introduction to the essentials. Intermediate learners can progress to a course of the highest frequency words needed for travel and business and begin to have conversations in Czech in a month. Advanced students will benefit most from the Speech Studio technology to correct their foreign accent. With Nemo, you can customize flashcards to exercise the language skill you want to improve. When beginning a new topic, setup flashcards to practice translation of Czech to English so you can build familiarity with new words. Next, switch to translate English to Czech to train your recall and ability to speak. To complete mastery, switch to cards that specialize in fine-tuning your listening and perfecting your pronunciation. Any card can be marked as a favorite, allowing you to make your own custom deck of cards to focus on the words of the day. Turn on Review Mode to recap what you practiced earlier in the day to boost your memory retention. Dive into what you want to learn at any time. The phrasebook offers quick access to the vocabulary in the app through a Czech-English dictionary interface. Nemo also functions as a translator. Simply find the words you need in the search interface and play its audio through the device speaker. ◆ Get off the beaten path or find comfort with traveler phrases. ◆ Build your proficiency with numbers and the most important verbs and sentence building blocks. ◆ Supports a “Word Gender” mode to display extra information about the gender of words. Czech is the primary language spoken in the Czech Republic and the cities of Prague, Plzeň, and Český Krumlov. Use your new skills to make friends, impress old friends, bring smiles to children, get out of jams, experience new things, talk confidently, and make your travel and cultural experience more rich and fulfilling. Download this free app now!
release_text: null

description: MPG Calculator Lite (Manor View IT) Fuel economy is quoted as either Miles per Gallon (MPG) or Kilometres per litre (Km/L). In the UK we use imperial units for distance but metric units for volume. This is a simple application to calculate the MPG for the previous tank of petrol. The app also does straightforward calculations in Imperial (MPG) and metric (KmL & L/100K) Instructions. Enter the miles travelled for the last tank of petrol and then either the number of litres or the cash value of petrol and the price per litre. The program will calculate the volume of petrol used and convert it to Gallons. The MPG value is then displayed. Values are automatically stored into a database , you can view your history as a graph or in a simple table.
release_text: 1) Saves results into SQLite Database (Only 1 entry per day) 2) Added graph view 3) Added history view

description: Save TIME and MONEY - up to 70% - at your local grocery and drug stores with this new app sweeping the country! Recently featured on The Steve Harvey Show, Forbes, and USA Today! Named by Consumer Reports as a BEST NEW APP of 2014! ★★★★★ Favado will help you discover the BEST sale and coupon combinations each week for your local grocery, drug and big box stores. You’ll find the freshest sale data from the weekly ad, and if a sale item also has coupons available, Favado will tell you where to find them. This can save you up to 70% - that’s $400 a month for the average family! ★★★★★ “Know before you go” with the Favado planning and search tools, and save valuable TIME. Quickly build your weekly shopping list from the weeks best sales, and stop over-spending at the store today. You can also search for items to compare prices before you run out for milk and bread. ★★★★★ With Favado, you know you are getting the best sale prices. Money saving experts across the country hand select the very best sales of the week, including “secret” or unadvertised sales, from more than 66,000 grocery and drugstores nationwide, and add them into Favado -- now the very best deals are right at your fingertips! ★There’s No Such Thing as Small Change★ Each week, you make a grocery list, trek to the store and spend more than you want to. Add it all up and it’s one of your biggest expenses each year. With Favado, slash your grocery bill and free up some cash for other things … like a vacation! Favado will help you outsmart the system and truly help you know before you go.  Download the Favado app today and start SAVING! FEATURES - Compare Prices Across Stores: Find out which store has the lowest prices this week - Favorite Sales: Tell us your favorite items and brands, and we'll show you when they go on sale at the stores you shop at - Best Sales: The most popular items at your stores this week, so you can quickly catch the deepest discounts - Instant Coupons: Integration with Cellfire instant coupons lets you load more savings right to your store card - Bigger Savings: Save even more by accessing printable coupons that match with items already on sale for up to 70% savings - Make a Grocery List: Save all the items to your shopping list so you have easy access to them in store. This is also great for helping remember special sale requirements, like buy-one-get-one
release_text: - Minor bug fixes - Updated location notifications to remind you to save! ***Favado helps you save time and money on your everyday purchases. If you like Favado, please take a moment to write us a review!***

description: "With over 50 ranches, the Apple Hill Growers Association (AHGA) farms have been a family destination since 1964. A family trip to visit the Apple Hill Growers means so much more than just apples and pies. It's memories that'll last a lifetime! It's berry farms, you-pick farms, and kid-friendly activities. For the grown-ups, it's fine wines and handcrafted beers in an incredible Sierra-soaked setting. It's Christmas trees for as far as your group can wander. On behalf of all the wonderful folks in the Apple Hill Grower area, we encourage you to make our little slice of heaven a part of your world. It's a tradition you'll cherish forever! Our farms are located in an area that stretches from Placerville to Camino to Pollock Pines, California--between Lake Tahoe and Sacramento on Highway 50. In addition to the AHGA ranch listings, events, and family fun, you'll find area restaurants, hotels, and other nearby adventure in this app."
release_text: null

description: Find your next home from the comfort of your phone with the realtor.com® real estate app for homes for sale and apartments for rent. Realtor.com® is the only app to get real estate property listings sourced directly from over 800 MLSs-90% of listings refreshed every 15 minutes . If you like the app, please share with your friends and leave a review on the Google Play App Store. Why realtor.com®? • 90% of listings updated every 15 minutes. All the rest updated at least once a day. • Quickly swipe to see rich and detailed photos of real estate properties, apartments for rent and homes for rent that interest you. • The only true search of homes for sale and rent by school or school district - make sure your next house is near your dream school! • Property listing details now include property tax, sales history and more school information including ratings for each house. • Draw your own custom search area right on the map! • Search nearby schools, homes for sale, open houses, recently sold homes, apartments for rent, and houses for rent with just one tap. • Use Area Scout to see results and average values update as you move. • Stay updated on the true status of real estate and apartment listings, including foreclosures, just taken off market, and price-reduced homes for sale. • Sign-in to save searches and listings. Access them again on your mobile phone or online at www.realtor.com. Find your home on the go with the realtor.com® Real Estate App. For real estate agents: •Connect and search with your clients! Learn more at http://marketing.realtor.com/collaborate Come hang with us! http://twitter.com/REALTORdotcom http://www.facebook.com/realtor.com Have feedback? Email us at androidsupport@realtor.com

description: Travelling in Europe*? Check traffic and road weather conditions along your route! Don’t waste any more time stuck in traffic jams! Traffic information from V-Traffic gives you real-time updates on traffic status, accidents, road closures, bottlenecks, road works, congestion, police checkpoints**, speed cameras** and animal hazards (wild animals crossing the road, farm animals on the road, etc.). Report any incidents you encounter while travelling simply by tapping the ‘Report event’ button and selecting the type of incident (accident, congestion, road works, slippery road, police checkpoint or animal hazard). Consult our road weather service before setting out. This will give you plenty of real-time warning of weather conditions that may affect traffic flow, saving you time and helping you travel more safely. Our road weather service was developed in partnership with the Finnish Meteorological Institute. Weather forecasts produced in partnership with Météo-France provide you with detailed weather predictions covering several days at a time. The most complete service available: V-Traffic covers more than 600,000 km of road network in Europe* , including motorways, secondary roads and urban arteries. All information is updated in real time, offering unprecedented levels of quality and accuracy. Whether commuting to work or travelling on vacation, you can now call up accurate traffic information directly from your smartphone. Travelling abroad? Avoid traffic congestion and plan the best routes using the latest local information, updated in real time. With a single tap, you can check traffic conditions in Paris, Stockholm, Olso, Warsaw, Copenhagen, Helsinki and many other European cities. *Available in: France, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Poland. **Depending on local legislation and availability.

description: The ultimate dubstep sequencer! Make wobble bass and filthy sounds. Arrange customized dubstep loops. Ease to use and perfect for dub steppers, bass heads and music producers, musicians and non-musicians alike. Make dubstep loops and arrangements at the touch of a finger; no musical knowledge is required. This easy to use app is perfect for dub steppers, bass heads and music producers, dj's musicians and non-musicians alike. ***** "Awesome app! - Hours of fun"..." the perfect, low barrier way to be a ‘bass head’… i was able to pump out beats like I was born to." - Blamza Review ***** Features: ◆ Studio quality samples, created by professional musicians and producers. ◆ Colour assigned buttons, for clear and straightforward use. ◆ Play your sounds at normal, half and double speed time signatures. *Sequencer The loop sequencer lets you layer up to ten dubstep sounds. Build fully customizable drum loops and layer these with fx, wobble bass and formant bass to create amazing Dubstep loops. * Loop Mixer The track mixer lets you tune your drum kits and adjust the sound volume and pitch of your selected samples. Select your drum sounds from a range of dubstep drum samples including : Kick drums, snares, claps, hi-hats, percussion, cymbals and other sound fx. *Wobble Bass Synthesizer Play dubstep basslines over your loops or on their own using the built in keyboard. Play synthesizer sounds over a large range of pitches allowing for limitless melodic possibilities. Program the synthesizer to play alongside the sequencer; choosing different note pitches and durations. Perfect for making loops on the move and making filthy dubstep sounds with ease at the touch of a finger. ***** Check out our other Electronic music apps: Bass Drop Dubstep - No.1 App in Australia: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bassdrop Bass Drop Drum and Bass: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bddrumandbass Wobble Bass Station: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.wbs

description: Gemeinsam mit Pädagogen entwickelt und dem Lehrplan angepasst. „Grundschule Deutsch - Erfolgreich lernen“, führt Dich mit vielen unterhaltsamen Lernspielen durch die Vorstufe und die Schuljahre der Klassen 1-4. Vieles von dem, was Du in der Schule gelernt hast, kannst Du nochmals üben und neue Dinge schon einmal ausprobieren. Dabei steht Dir Patsy Panzer, die schlaue Schildkröte zur Seite. Belohnungssystem: Jede Klassenstufe beinhaltet einen Test. Wird dieser bestanden, öffnet sich ein Belohnungsspiel für lang anhaltende Motivation. Lernerfolg: Eine ausführliche Übersicht zeigt, in welchen Bereichen ein Lernerfolg erzielt wurde - oder wo eventuell noch ein wenig geübt werden muss! Extras: Ein kleines Malprogramm mit verschiedenen Funktionen steht für Notizen und kleine Zeichnungen zur Verfügung. Grundschule Deutsch: Enthält viele Aufgaben um Lesen, Rechtschreibung und Grammatik effizient und spielerisch zu üben. Die Lernbereiche sind übersichtlich aufgebaut und auch, wenn Du alleine lernst, wirst Du die Aufgaben schnell verstehen. • Lernprogramm orientiert sich am Lehrplan für Grundschulen von der ersten bis zur vierten Klasse • Lesen, Rechtschreibung und Grammatik spielerisch üben und trainieren • Statistische Übersicht der Lernerfolge • Mit Mini-Malprogramm für kleine Zeichnungen und Notizen Developed in collaboration with educators and adapted the curriculum. "Primary school German - Successful learning" takes you with many entertaining educational games through the input stage and the school years in classes 1-4. Much of what you have learned in school, you can practice and try new things ever again. The focus is you Patsy tanks that sly turtle to the side. Reward system: Each grade level includes a test. If this existed, a reward game for long prolonged motivation opens. Learning: A detailed overview shows the areas in which a learning success was achieved - or where possibly a little needs to be practiced! Extras: A small paint program with various functions available for notes and small drawings available. Primary school German: Contains many tasks to reading, spelling and grammar efficiently and playfully practicing. The learning areas are well laid out and also when you learn alone, will you understand the tasks quickly. • learning program is based on the curriculum for elementary schools from the first to the fourth grade • reading, spelling and grammar practice playful and train • Statistical Summary of learning outcomes • With mini-paint program for young drawings and notes

description: Гадание по Книге Перемен популярный способ взглянуть во мглу будущего и получить предсказание судьбы. Четыре простых действия для ответа на твой вопрос: 1. Прочитай значение выпавшей гексограммы. Ты можешь бросать монеты сам, если есть такая возможность. Брось монеты шесть раз. Единственный доступ - доступ в интернет. В приложение встроен рекламный баннер. Для того, чтоб мы могли и дальше разрабатывать для вас приложения и улучшать их. Благодарим Вас за поддержку. Hexagrams be built automatically and you can directly read its value. Appendix Divination I Ching Book of Changes can operate as a simple guide to the Book of Changes (I Ching). Do not ask the same question twice. The value of fortune telling in this case is reduced to zero. Let the answers applications Divination I Ching Book of Changes will be useful in your life. The application is integrated banner. In order that we can continue to develop for you applications and improve them. Thank you for your support.

description: Play Winx Fairy School up to level 5 for FREE today and try before you buy the full version :-) Dear Winx Club fans! Welcome to Alfea, a magical school for fashionable fairies just like you! Alfea is opening its doors to girls and boys around the world. Are you ready to transform into a stylish Believix Fairy? It won’t be easy! Alfea contains a secret that the Trix witches are desperate to uncover, you’ll need to use all your fairy powers to find it before they do! You’ll meet all your favourite Winx Club characters, including Bloom, Stella, Aisha, Flora, Musa, Tecna, Professor Palladium, and Daphne. But there’s more to Alfea than magic and adventure - there’s fashion too. In Alfea, Stella’s Fashion Boutique is open 24 hours. You can change your fairy style as often as you like. description: This application is translated to your language! Please email me if the translation can be improved or if you like to translate this application to an other language. 'Know where you are, know where you have been, and get where you want to go.' With reliable GPS track recordings, a large GPS compass, various online and offline (free) maps and extensive search options, you can navigate when you go off the beaten track. Know where you are Check out the large compass with G-force meter, and read your speed, altitude, and slope. Study the trip computer to know your performance over time. Use various online maps and offline maps, all for free! Use the maps to navigate. Just tap on the map and get instant information like accurate coordinates, street view images, addresses and distances. Know where you have been Record GPS Points Of Interest (POIs), for example to remember where you parked your car. Record GPS tracks while you are walking. Check out performance figures of your tracks like altitude and speed profiles. Get where you want to go Navigate to POIs and navigate along tracks, supported by a large compass. Besides the compass, you will get clear instructions by visuals and spoken voice. Search for addresses and businesses via Google, or via Yahoo if you prefer. Search for photos of Panoramio. Search for interesting spots via Wikipedia. Even search for and download tracks from GPSies, which offers around one million tracks by now. Track your buddies live on your Android device or PC, and be aware that they track you! Just for fun, but also for safety while being in the outback. Tracky support the following languages: Brazilian Portuguese, Czech, Traditional and Simple Chinese, Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish. A free trial version 'TrackyTry' is also available. It has the same features as the paid Tracky app, except that recorded tracks and POIs will not be stored. Tracky: GPS track recording, large compass, online and offline maps, search, navigate
release_text: - support for Geocaching! - share your POIs/tracks via email, DropBox, etc. - improved GPS settings - improved track navigation - updated translations for Korean, Russian, Danish, Spanish - several user interface improvements

description: A complete guide to Switzerland that works offline. Features: - Switzerland In Depth: the background info that you need to have before you go. - A country map highlighting all the cities and national parks. - Complete city guides for the most important destinations, with sights, restaurants, things to do and a city map. - Mini guides for less important destinations. - German, French, Italian phrasebooks. About Triposo: We make great, interactive travel guides. To make our guides we use the content that is freely available. Open content sites like Wikitravel, Wikipedia, World66 and Openstreetmap are among the best resources for any traveler. Our mission is to make that content relevant for you. So we mix and mash and annotate - and we distill great, relevant travel guides out of it. We like open content. In fact some of us were involved in World66, one of the first open content travel guides on the web. Triposo's travel guides are very much a re-mix of open content out there. Currently we're using content from: Wikipedia, Wikitravel, World66, Open Streetmaps, DMOZ and Chefmoz We're big fans of these projects. If you stumble across some inaccurate information in this guide, we would appreciate
release_text: We've implemented features requested by some of you: - Tap the image of a place to see more photos of that place. For this you need an internet connection. - The hotel map is more useful now, as we display directly the prices you searched for instead of icons. If you like Triposo, please take the time to give us a nice review: it really helps.

description: **NOTE: This app has been retired! Which means that I will not provide updates, and Boxee.tv is not going to be supported. This is the simplest WiFi remote for Boxee™(*) you'll find! With only your thumb, you can control your Boxee. You don't even have to look at the remote app in your phone, just swipe away :) Navigation with this remote is done by swipe gestures: swipe your thumb up, to navigate up in Boxee. Swipe down to navigate down, etc. Tap to select an item in Boxee. Simple, ah? There are other features too: * Auto detection of a Boxee server. * Physical BACK button is mapped to Boxee's BACK (set in app settings). * Android soft-keyboard will send keys to Boxee, e.g., when there is a text-box open in Boxee. * Seek to a specific time by tapping the progress bar. * Automatically pauses a playing video upon a phone call! * Support for password protected Boxee * And more! (*) Boxee is a trademark of Boxee, Inc or Samsung.

description: Analog Clock Widget Talking Pro Kindly uninstall our Lite version i.e. Analog Clock Widget Talking Lite first, before installing the Pro version. This widget is the full version of our free Analog Clock Widget. It has the feature of saying the time, along with the cuckoo effect. We request you to please try out the Lite version first. Our Lite version allows you to preview the feature. See in the "More From This Developer" section. The application comes with 5 neon solid color designs. Additional themes can also be downloaded. Minimum widget size is 2x2 and is re-sizable. Support for saying the time in other languages. This clock uses the TTS engine installed on your phone. ENSURE YOU HAVE TTS ENGINE INSTALLED ON YOUR PHONE. You can customize your TTS engine settings. Thus you can modify it to say in different languages as well modify the speed. To do so, please enter your Phone Settings and see the Languages & Input settings. There you will find your TTS Settings. Drop us a mail, in case the app is not working for you. Analog clock gives a very distinct personal feel, which digital clocks just do not give. We therefore look forward to develop additional designs which are usually not present in other analog clock widget applications. Our users may also come forward and suggest designs which they have in their minds. Do drop us an email to let us know. We will surely attempt to make one. Kindly do rate our app well and in case of any problems drop us an email. THIS IS A WIDGET APP. IT NEEDS TO BE ADDED ON YOUR HOME SCREEN. IT WOULD NOT BE SEEN IN YOUR APP DRAWER. STEPS TO ADD THE WIDGET: 1) LONG PRESS ON AN EMPTY REGION OF YOUR HOME SCREEN. 2) WAIT FOR THE MENU TO POPUP 3) SELECT TO ADD WIDGET 4) THIS WOULD LOAD ALL THE WIDGETS INSTALLED ON YOUR PHONE. (SEE THE SCREENSHOT) 5) SELECT OUR APP (SEE THE APP ICON) Note: The Phone State permission is required as we need to ensure that the clock does not talk while you are taking a call.
release_text: -0.6.1 Bug Fixes -0.6 Option to say the time on tapping the widget, mention which hours of the day can be taken as Morning, Afternoon, Evening & Night. We thank Peter Brodie & Benjy Copeland for suggesting to add these features. Using different TTS engines, one can customize the time to be said in ones own language. Enter your phone settings within which see 'Languages and Input'. Two prefix options given, 'Time is' & 'It is'. Plus toast notifications on time. File size less than 1 MB.

description: Теперь вы можете покупать билеты в любой из 34 кинотеатров «Формулы Кино» с помощью приложения, выпущенного сетью «Формула Кино» совместно с компанией «Киноход». С мобильным приложением покупка билетов совершается за пару минут. При этом совершенно не важно, где вы находитесь: в кафе, на прогулке, в транспорте или в любом самом неожиданном месте. Цена билета – точно такая же, как в кассе кинотеатра: без наценок или комиссий. Now you can buy tickets at any of the 34 cinemas "Formula Kino" using the application, issued network "Formula Kino" together with "Kinohod." With mobile ticketing application is made for a couple of minutes. In this case it does not matter where you are: in a cafe on the promenade, in transport or in any the most unexpected place. Ticket price - exactly the same as in the cinema box office: no extra charges or fees.

developer: The Modern Pen and Paper Company, LLC
description: Tapout Tracker XT2 is a fully functional digital notebook to track your TapouT XT, XT2, and XT Hybrid workouts. Embrace Technology! Stay Mobile! Spring is Here!!! Don't quit it. Track it! Includes: TapouT XT, TapouT XT2, and TapouT XT Hybrid workout programs. Each workout program (XT, XT2, and XTH) is divided up into three workout phases. The number of days in each phase is based on program you are using. Tapout Tracker XT2 features include (but not limited to) - Track your workout dates not calendar days. - Reminder/alert of your next workout. Set and forget. What workout is today? Oh yeah?! - Add a note, a goal, a focus point to each workout - rough day? bad recup? - Rate the difficulty level of workout. - Track the time you performed the workout - Ability to divide double workouts days into AM/PM Track your progress with Focus Points: - Add a photo to every measurement day! - Record your measurements: Weight (Chest, Arm, Waist, Hips, Thigh)* - Total Measurements: *Automatically calculates/tracks measurements to show overall change. - Share your progress!!! *Focus Points is one of our inside app apps :) - a mini app if you will. - future features will be decided by your feedback. Why track it if you can't view it! - View your workout data with a click of a button. - Share your progress! Share your stats. Share your photos. - Standard/metric option (lb/in - kg/cm). - Export (all data) to Fitness Report(s) to view or print. **Future release = Very soon** Tapout Tracker XT2, like all our products, is NEVER a finished product. If you have a suggestion for a feature let us know. Any questions, suggestions, or comments please email me! Weight Tracker v1.1 included! - yes, another mini apps :) - a digital weight diary. - add your weight any time you want. - include a quick diary note with each measurement. - generate and export your weight report Permission: Write access to external storage is needed to create a "TapoutTrackerXT2" folder and export your Fitness Reports and other data reports to this folder. Languages: - English - Spanish (~95% translated). Includes Fitness Reports. *Me disculpo si la traducción no es correcto. The Modern Pen and Paper Company™ Creating apps that save more than time! The Modern Pen and Paper Company™ is not affiliated with ABG TapouT, LLC or any of their business entities.

description: ********Only For Android 7'' Tablets******** ***Only for the following devices:- Samsung Galaxy Tab, Amazon Kindle, HTC Flyer, Nook Color, eNTourage eDge and Toshiba Folio Do you need a printable sign in form for collecting the names, addresses, phone #'s, and email addresses of the attendees? Sign In Form app for Android 7” inch tablet is here to help you and can be used as an attendance sheet for almost any purpose. The app lets you save and re-use the attendance sheet, so you can see and keep a track of the contact database of the attendees over time. If you would like to share the sheet with your team members at office, class, workshop or seminar, simply tap e-mail, to send the information instantly anytime and anywhere. description: WHERE’S MY VALENTINE FEATURES 12 EXCLUSIVE LOVE-THEMED LEVELS STARRING SWAMPY AND PERRY! Swampy and Perry need some love – are you up to the challenge? SWAMPY’S STORY Swampy is a little different than other alligators in the sewers and he loves to take showers! Cut through dirt and guide water to Swampy’s shower across six challenging levels but keep an eye out for algae, tricks and traps! PERRY’S STORY In Perry’s levels, use water in all its different forms – ice, steam and liquid – to solve the puzzles and to help Agent P get to headquarters. Even super-sleuths need help! FOR AN AD FREE EXPERIENCE AND EVEN MORE EXCLUSIVE LEVELS, UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSIONS OF WHERE’S MY WATER AND WHERE’S MY PERRY TODAY! WHERE’S MY WATER • Now features over 250 water-filled levels • 3 brand new levels to play every week – for FREE • Use fans, water balloons, toxic water, switches, bombs, and algae to solve puzzles • Meet Swampy’s friends including Cranky and the Mystery Duck WHERE’S MY PERRY - Over 100 spy-themed challenges and growing! The evil villain Dr. Doofenshmirtz has scattered all kinds of lasers across the sewers – you’ll need to use them to change water to it’s different forms to help power Agent P’s transportation tubes! • Over 120 spy-themed levels featuring tons of 'Inators • Collect all of the hidden dossiers to unlock bonus levels • Try the brand-new Dr. Doofenshmirtz levels featuring the brand new Minion-inator! Visit www.facebook.com/WheresMyWater for hints, tips, tricks and other classified materials! Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies and some third parties. Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

description: *Help Purple 무료버전입니다. 안녕? 내 이름은 퍼플. 난 지금 친구들을 구하기 위해 휴지 괴물을 찾아 휴지(Huge)의 몸 속으로 들어가려던 참이야. 너 혹시 숨은 그림 찾기 좀 하니? 거기다 똑똑하다면 금상첨화지. 혹시 그렇다면 나를 도와줄래? 니가 나를 도와준다면 퍼플 세계를 함께 모험 할 수 있게 해줄게… Please~~ ◆ 친구를 기다릴 때! 혹은 혼자서 심심할 때! 킬링 타임 용으로 적절한 게임! 이제 누군가를 기다리는 순간, 혼자가 되는 순간 마다 당신은 ‘퍼플 모험’에 빠지고 말 것입니다. 숨은 아이템 찾아 퍼플이 앞으로 나아갈 수 있도록 주위의 숨은 모든 비밀을 풀어주세요!! ■ 게임 특징 → 매력포인트는 바로 ‘퍼플’ 그 자체 엉뚱하고 귀여운 퍼플의 매력에 빠져보세요. 퍼플을 터치하면 다양한 반응을 보입니다. 퍼플은 과연 어떤 반응들을 보일까요? 귀여운 퍼플의 중독성있는 재롱을 기대해주세요! → 숨은 그림찾기는 시작에 불과하다! 화면 속에 숨은 수수께끼를 찾아라! 화면 속에 숨은 아이템들을 찾아 퍼플이 앞으로 나아갈 수 있도록 도와주어야 합니다. 기존의 틀을 깨는 상상력으로 아이템을 조합해보세요! → 진화하는 능력 아르쿠스 친구들을(무지개 신) 찾을 때 마다 그 색깔이 가진 능력을 흡수하게 됩니다. 때로는 불로 물을 녹이기도 하고, 빛을 비춰 숨겨진 아이템을 찾을 수 있습니다. → 컬렉션 퍼플 게임이 플레이 되는 도 중 화면 곳곳에서 컬렉션 아이템들이 나타났다 사라집니다. 빠른 순발력으로 총 420개의 컬렉션들을 수집해보세요! →컬렉션 트레이드 기능 전세계 친구들과 컬렉션 교환을 해보세요! 내가 가지지 못한 컬렉션은 트레이드 기능을 통해 교환할 수 있습니다. 친구들과 퍼플 컬렉션을 교환해보세요!! * 퍼플은 … 날씨를 다스리는 신들이 살고 있는 구름 위 마을, 눈을 내리게 하는 신, '닉스' 비를 내리게 하는 신, '임버' 그리고, 무지개를 그리는 7명의 신 '아르쿠스' 어느 날, 거대한 휴지 괴물이 나타나 마을을 휩쓸고 간 후 마을 사람들과 친구들을 사라지게 됩니다. 홀로 남은 “Purple”은 이들을 구하기 위해 휴지의 몸 속으로 모험을 떠납니다. 당신은 “Purple”이 무사히 마을 사람들과 친구들을 구할 수 있도록 “Purple”을 도와주는 역할을 합니다. 때로는 길을 막고 있는 바위를 치워주기도 하고, 때로는 끊어진 다리를 다시 이어주기도 합니다. 포인트 앤 터치 방식의 어드벤처 게임으로, 스토리를 진행하면서 수집한 컬렉션을 다른 사람들과 교환할 수도 있습니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 0502-060-0001 부산광역시 해운대구 센텀북대로 60 센텀IS타워 1302호 * Help Purple is a free version. description: Hide your private photos and videos in this password protected vault for Free! ★ Hide photos and videos. ★ PIN protected vault. ★ Free cloud backup. Now with Cloud Backup, once subscribed, the app uploads your photos and videos to your private online account, so you can recover them even if your phone is damaged or stolen. Wondering how to hide and protect your private videos and photos from others? This is the app you want. With Private Gallery, you can shoot your photos or take videos with in the app or import them from your phone's Gallery. Those private photos and videos are hidden from the Android Gallery and encrypted with strong keys in our secure folder, so only you can see them with your password. Private Gallery protects your private pictures even when your phone is stolen or your Google account has been compromised. Private Gallery protects your privacy against all possible scenarios, while you want to keep your photos personal, you still can export the encrypted photos to share with your friends. Features: * Take photos/videos or import them from Android Gallery. * Cloud Backup keeps your files secure. * Built-in gallery to view your photos and videos. * Decrypt and export your files. How to use Private Gallery 1. When you open the app for the first time, you will be prompted to create a password. This password will be used to lock your personal photos. 2. Touch the camera button to start shooting or import pictures from your regular gallery app, your private videos and pictures will be saved safely in your vault. 3. Press the gallery button to open your vault and browse.
release_text: * Added album management, create albums, rename albums and move photos between albums. * You can now import multiple photo and video files at once. * Cloud Backup: Backs up your private photos to the secure cloud server, protects them against theft or phone damage.

description: Do you think you know your MLB baseball trivia? Categories: AL Awards, AL Stats, NL Awards, NL Stats. We've decided to do our own Trivia Game right. QUESTIONS - are carefully researched so people really interested in the subjects will have fun knowing the answers. description: Fake ID is an Android vulnerability that allows applications to impersonate other applications by copying their identity that can then be used for malicious purposes. Allows for malicious apps to impersonate other applications by copying their identity – their digital certificate(s) used to cryptographically sign the application package (APK file) – and combining it with their own signature making a chain whereby the parent signature (also known as the “issuer”) can be used to verify the child signatures. The Fake ID vulnerability, is present in most Android versions 2.1 and above. Depending on the hardware manufacturer and the version of Android running on your device you may be vulnerable to one or more of more privileged attack vectors as described by BlueBox who discovered the vulnerability and of course, given this problem relates to chains of certificates, a hacker could chose to include many certificates to cover all of these options, and more, in their specifically crafted malware. McAfee Fake ID Detector enables you to quickly discover if your applications contain the exploit. Privacy Protection Malicious http://blogs.mcafee.com/mcafee-labs/beware-impostor-android-apps
release_text: Fake ID or FakeID Scanner is a security product that help in protecting your privacy.

description: NenaMark2 is an OpenGL|ES 2.0 benchmark for high-end mobile devices, continuing where the popular NenaMark1 left off with more advanced graphical effects and higher resolution graphics. Unlike many other benchmarks, NenaMark measures performance using realistic scenes that could be taken from a typical game and presents the result in frames per second, i.e. providing an intuitive performance number that can be used for realistic comparisons between different devices. Benchmark results from a wide variety of devices are available on the NenaMark site ( http://nena.se/nenamark ). Effects: - Skeletal Animation (bones matrix animation), trees. - Morph Target Animation (blend vertex sets), sun flowers along house wall. - Bump Mapping (using normal map), stone walls on house. - Water (reflections, normal animation, fresnel effect), the lake. - Cloud System (advanced particle system), clouds. - Cube Map Reflections (w/ dynamic cube map generation), windows on house. - Smoke (advanced particle system), smoke from chimney. - Shadow Mapping (dynamic shadow mapping), terrain. - Texture Channel Animation, sparkling sun. - Smooth Gradient Animation, sky hemisphere. - Dynamic lighting (per vertex diffuse lighting), entire scene. - Lens flare, lens flare from sun at low altitude. For more information, visit: http://nena.se/nenamark
release_text: - run button can be triggered with KEYCODE_DPAD_CENTER or KEYCODE_BUTTON_START for automated benchmarking

description: A complete SSHd, SFTP, SCP and Telnet server! From now on you can run a complete SSH daemon (server) with support for multiple users, public key authentication, and you can even set a directory per user for SFTP and SCP. NO ROOT is required, but if you do have a rooted device you can run SSH as super user if you want. The shell will only work on ARM devices, however, the SFTP and SCP servers will work on all devices. Note 1. To run on ports below 1024 search for Android app Port Forwarder Ultimate. Note 2. If you find a bug or have a problem please contact us by email since we cannot help you if you post it in the reviews. And we haven’t mentioned all yet; you can even set a dynamic DNS updater! So you can always access your device from everywhere, even if the IP changed! It also has extensive logging functionality, and you can even set the app to email you the log automatically! Features summary: - SSH has support for SFTP and SCP - For SSH, SFTP and SCP multiple users can be set with each their own root directory, password, public key (RSA or DSA), allow X11 or agent forwarding, allow inbound/outbound connections, optional write permission and optional force stay in root directory - For Telnet you can add multiple users and run Telnet through SSL/TLS with your own certificate or our certificate - Set your own shell start command and arguments (advanced) - Start/Stop a server automatically when connected/disconnected from a specified WIFI network, or on boot - Verbose log (filter, email, etc) - Optionally only allow specified IP addresses to access - Add a Dynamic DNS Updater using the local or public IP of your device - The servers can be accessed from the web (for example through your 3G connection) if supported by your mobile network All features: - Add multiple SSH (SSHd, SSH daemon) or Telnet servers - For every SSH Server you can set name, port, multiple users, only access from certain IP addresses, vibrate on a new connection, enable logging, only log errors, start the server when connected to a specific WIFI network and disconnect when the WIFI network is lost, start on boot, max auth attempts, authorization timeout, idle timeout, max concurrent sessions (per user) - For every user set the username, password, public key, X11 / agent forwarding, inbound / outbound connections, document root, force stay in document root, allow write access - For every Telnet server you can set multiple users or even enable SSL/TLS with your own certificate or our certificate - Add multiple dynamic DNS updaters (set a custom URL, or choose from ChangeIP, DNSdynamic, DNSexit, DNSMadeEasy, DNS-O-Matic, DNSPark, DtDNS, DynDNS, easyDNS, eNom, HE.net, Joker, Namecheap, No-IP, ZoneEdit) - For every dynamic DNS updater set the name, timeout (in minutes), hostname, username, password and whether to update with the local or public IP address, start the Dynamic DNS Updater when connected to a specific WIFI network, update on connectivity change, start on boot - On the settings page of the app you can set the maximum log items to keep, whether to keep a WIFI lock (prevent WIFI from disconnecting automatically), keep the device alive, keep the device alive full (keep the screen on, battery intensive), set to start the app on boot - You can search/filter the log, or set it to be automatically sent when the log limit is reached For questions, comments or feature requests just contact us! Visit us on: http://www.icecoldapps.com/ Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceColdApps Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IceColdApps
